data.text: @jayfug Damn straight. Some really good journalists doing vital work. Friends of the American people.
@craasch Thanks, Chuck. I appreciate that. Whole SD press corps has done itself proud.
@jayfug Great work over the last two years, Jeremy.

The 10,631 COVID-19 hospitalizations in South Dakota equal about the 12th largest city in the state, equal to towns such as Brandon or Box Elder.
https://t.co/RtTQ3c10e9

The 2,848 COVID-19 deaths in South Dakota about equals the 30th largest city in the state -- say, the entire population of towns such as Lead, Summerset or Winner. 
(cc @IanMSwanson1110)
https://t.co/RtTQ3c10e9
@jayfug 2848 deaths. What SD town has a similar population?
Math note: I'm using the 895,376 South Dakota population estimate for 2021, from the Census Bureau. If you use a different population count/estimate, your results will vary.
